"A.P.242/2/26/14:00": "This is the deepest part of Amduscia...?"

"〔Yes.〕〔It is a sacred domain,〕
〔the Infernal Dragon's Grave.〕
〔This is also〕〔my first time here.〕"
"But this state it's in... It appears to have been corrupted."

"〔It is the same〕〔as the lands〕
〔transformed by〕〔[Profound Darkness].〕"
"...I wonder if this is the same place Aika and I were."
"No, this is different. It feels as if it has always been this way... Well, Rela?"

"〔It is as〕〔Quna says.〕
〔The path〕〔to Kashina〕
〔has always〕〔been this way.〕"

"〔When what you call〕〔corrupted areas〕
〔first appeared,〕〔it was thought that〕
〔Kashina had〕〔awakened.〕"

"〔That this〕〔was what Kashina〕
〔desired,〕〔for the Dragons,〕
〔for Amduscia.〕"

"〔Those who〕〔remained here〕
〔have gone mad〕〔from Kashina's influence,〕
〔and attack〕〔indiscriminately.〕"

"〔For that reason,〕〔nobody has entered,〕
〔nobody has approached,〕
〔Kashina sleeps here〕〔in solitude.〕"
"Kashina is in here... The key to bringing Xiao back."
"All of us want to bring Xiao back."
"But, that's exactly why we can't rush it. It'll be okay, Sara."

"〔Right.〕〔Do not worry,〕〔oracle of ARKS.〕
〔Because I〕〔am with you.〕"
